message.content:
The sequences seem to move all digits occurring before the 9 to end of the sequence. So the transformation function might be:

```python
def transform(sequence):
    nines_index = sequence.find('9')
    return sequence[nines_index:] + sequence[:nines_index]
```

    return sequence[nines_index:] + sequence[:nines_index].

the original sequence "07777009000000000" is transformed into "00000009007777000", the original sequence "11110090000000000" is transformed into "00000090011110000", the original sequence "02222090000000000" is transformed into "00000090222200000"

The sequences seem to move all digits occurring before the 9 to end of the sequence. So the transformation function might be:

```python
def transform(sequence):
    nines_index = sequence.find('9')
    return sequence[nines_index:] + sequence[:nines_index]
```
